content.question: Which of the following was an economic policy of Louis XIV’s finance minister, Jean-Baptiste Colbert?

choices.label: Encouraging international competition through lower tariffs and free-trade policies
Establishing detailed manufacturing codes to improve the quality of French export goods
Opening France’s colonies to foreign merchants and trade

content.answer: Establishing detailed manufacturing codes to improve the quality of French export goods
